alert.note: Alert for Hardeman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:39AM CST until January 03 at 7:15AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN MARSHALL...NORTHWESTERN TIPPAH...NORTHERN BENTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 639 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holly Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Michigan City, Slayden, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Brody, Hudsonville, Higdon, New Canaan, Early Grove, Atway, Hamilton, Mack, Mahon and Tiplersville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
